amendment.description: To provide the Department of Justice with additional tools to target extraterritorial drug trafficking activity, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3362, under the order of 3/2/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 28.

action.text: Amendment SA 3362 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3378. (consideration: CR S1180, S1203; text: CR S1180) To provide the Department of Justice with additional tools to target extraterritorial drug trafficking activity, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3362, under the order of 3/2/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 28.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3362, under the order of 3/2/16, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 0. Record Vote Number: 28.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3362 proposed by Senator Grassley for Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 3378.
